generic_instructions: In this task, we need you to categorize some sentences. Below, we list the possible categories. Please read the description of each category carefully, and click "Start the task" at the bottom of this section to start the next section. In that section, sentences will be shown. Please choose a category for each sentence by selecting an option from the drop-down menu at the right of the sentence.
generic_introduction: Our goal is to build an AI chat bot that can help people complete certain tasks. To achieve this goal and train the bot, we need some sentences labeled by human annotators. Please help us classify the sentences below.

questionCategories.title: transactions
questionCategories.instruction: Request for information about transactions of a bank account.

examples.content: how much did my last purchase cost
examples.explain: Purchase causes a transaction, so it is a question about transactions.

examples.content: i need to see all visa purchases for march
examples.explain: Purchase causes a transaction, so it is a question about transactions.

counterexamples.content: help me transfer $x from credit to debit
counterexamples.explain: It is not asking for information, so it should not be classified as transactions. Instead, it should be classified as "transfer".

counterexamples.content: how much do i have to pay for my cable bill
counterexamples.explain: It is asking for information about bill balance.

questionCategories.title: transfer
questionCategories.instruction: Request to make a transfer from one banking account to another one.

examples.content: send over a hundred dollars from huntington into saving
examples.explain: Sending money is the same as making a transfer.

examples.content: send 1200 dollars between usaa and navy federal accounts
examples.explain: Sending money is the same as making a transfer.

counterexamples.content: Pay my internet bill with my discover account
counterexamples.explain: Paying a bill does not transfer money to a banking account, so this sentence should not be categorized as transfer. Instead, it should be categorized as "pay bill".

counterexamples.content: is tehre enough in my bluebird account for groceries this week
counterexamples.explain: This sentence is asking for information about the balance in an account, so it should be categorized as "balance".

questionCategories.title: balance
questionCategories.instruction: Ask information about the amount of money in a banking account.

examples.content: is there enough in my bluebird account for groceries this week
examples.explain: To answer this question, information about the balance of the banking is required. Therefore, it is asking for information about the balance.

examples.content: how much money is in my checking account
examples.explain: It is asking the amount of money in a banking account.

counterexamples.content: what's the balance on my bills
counterexamples.explain: This sentence asks for information about bills, instead of a banking account. Thus, it should be classified as "bill balance" instead of "balance".

counterexamples.content: i need to see all visa purchases for march
counterexamples.explain: This is asking for the information about transactions.

questionCategories.title: pay bill
questionCategories.instruction: Request for help to pay a bill.

examples.content: use my checkings account to pay the electric bill
examples.explain: It requests to pay the electric bill.

examples.content: can you give me a hand paying my water bill
examples.explain: It asks for help to pay a bill.

counterexamples.content: how much do i have to pay for my cable bill
counterexamples.explain: This sentence is asking for information about a bill, instead of paying it. Therefore, this sentence should be categorized as "bill balance", instead of "pay balance".

counterexamples.content: send 1200 dollars between usaa and navy federal accounts
counterexamples.explain: This request is to send money, so it should be categorized as "transfer".

questionCategories.title: bill balance
questionCategories.instruction: Request for information about the balance of a bill.

examples.explain: To answer this question, information about the balance of the bills is required. So it is a request for information about bill balance.

examples.content: what am i being charged for my water bill
examples.explain: This question asks the balance of the water bill.

counterexamples.content: what's the balance of my savings
counterexamples.explain: This sentence asks for information about the balance of a banking account, instead of a bill. So it should be categorized as "balance", rather than "bill balance".

counterexamples.content: i'd like to pay my bill
counterexamples.explain: This sentence does not ask for information about a bill. It should be categorized as "pay bill".
